mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_WL_APPLY ( id, FUNCTION_TYPE, APPLY_STATUS, APPROVE_ID, VALID, CREATE_USER, CREATE_TIME) VALUES ( #{id},#{functionType},#{applyStatus},#{approveId},'1',#{createUser},sysdate )
mapper.update: update TB_WL_APPROVE_EXPAND set APPROVE_RESULT=#{approveResult}, APPROVE_REMARK=#{approveRemark}, AUDIT_FLAG=#{auditFlag}, APPROVE_DATE=sysdate, UPDATE_USER=#{updateUser}, UPDATE_TIME=sysdate where approve_id = #{approveId} and approve_user = #{approveUser}
update TB_WL_AUDIT_USER set valid ='0' where APPROVE_ID=#{approveId} and APPROVE_USER!=#{approveUser}
UPDATE TB_WL_APPROVE_EXPAND SET AUDIT_FLAG = '0',update_user = #{updateUser},update_time = sysdate WHERE AUDIT_FLAG = '1' AND APPROVE_ID = #{approveId}
mapper.select: SELECT id, APPROVE_ID approveId, APPROVE_USER approveUser, APPROVE_EXPAND_ID FROM TB_WL_AUDIT_USER where APPROVE_ID = #{approveId} and valid = '1'
select IF_EXPAND from TB_WL_RULE where ID=#{id}

SELECT id, APPLY_ID applyId, NEXT_APPROVE_ID nextApproveId, APPROVE_NODE approveNode, APPROVE_USER approveUser, APPROVE_STATUS approveStatus, APPROVE_RESULT approveResult, APPROVE_REMARK approveRemark, APPROVE_STEP approveStep, APPROVE_DATE approveDate, AUDIT_FLAG auditFlag FROM TB_WL_APPROVE WHERE VALID = '1' AND id = #{id}

SELECT APPROVE_ID FROM TB_WL_APPLY WHERE ID = (SELECT apply_id FROM TB_WL_BUSINESS_R_APPLY WHERE BUSINESS_ID = #{businessId} AND CREATE_TIME = (SELECT max(CREATE_TIME) FROM TB_WL_BUSINESS_R_APPLY WHERE BUSINESS_ID = #{businessId} AND VALID = '1') AND VALID = '1') AND VALID = '1'
select AUDIT_FLAG auditFlag from TB_WL_APPROVE_EXPAND where APPROVE_ID=#{approveId} and valid = '1'

SELECT r.id, r.node, r.NEXT_NODE_ID nextNodeId, r.status, r.condition, r.FUNCTION_TYPE functionType, r.SORT_ID sortId, r.APPROVE_ROLE approveRole, r.remark, r.IF_EXPAND ifExpand FROM TB_WL_RULE r WHERE ID = #{id}
SELECT uuid FROM TB_WL_APPROVE_EXPAND WHERE approve_id = #{approveId} AND APPROVE_USER = #{approveUser} AND valid='1'
select uuid from TB_WL_APPROVE_EXPAND where AUDIT_FLAG='1' and APPROVE_ID = #{approveId}

SELECT r.id, r.node, r.NEXT_NODE_ID nextNodeId, r.status, r.condition, r.FUNCTION_TYPE functionType, r.SORT_ID sortId, r.APPROVE_ROLE approveRole, r.remark, r.IF_EXPAND ifExpand FROM TB_WL_RULE r WHERE function_type = #{functionType} AND node = #{nodeName}

SELECT max(to_number(APPROVE_STEP)) step FROM ( SELECT APPROVE_STEP FROM tb_wl_approve WHERE APPLY_ID = #{applyId} UNION SELECT APPROVE_STEP FROM TB_WL_APPROVE_EXPAND WHERE APPROVE_ID IN (SELECT ID FROM tb_wl_approve WHERE APPLY_ID = #{applyId}) )
select USERNAME from BG_SYS_USER where USERID = #{userId}
